title: Middle Earth Supplier
text: Template for a retail store which uses fictional products to demonstrate the functionality. Backed by a MySQL database with a Sequelize ORM. Uses Passport for user authentication.

title: Employee Tracker
text: Command-line CMS for tracking employees, roles, and departments using Node.js, Inquirer, and MySQL.

title: Team Generator
text: Node.js command-line application that generates an HTML webpage. Uses Jest for running unit tests and Inquirer for collecting user input.

title: Park Hopper
text: Search for national parks using the NPS API and view their locations in Google Maps.

title: Weather Forecast
text: Dashboard to retrieve weather data for cities using the OpenWeather API.

title: Code Quiz
text: Timed JavaScript quiz with multiple-choice questions.
